category: news
title: "Vivo unveiled 6nm imaging chip V3"
excerpt: "The latest V3 chip features a newly designed multi-concurrent AI-ISP architecture and second-generation Frame Info Tunneling (FIT) technology, which Vivo said delivers a better user experience by enabling 4K cinema-like bokeh, the aesthetic quality of the blur produced in the out-of-focus parts of an image produced by a lens."
